p: The number of heartbeats of larvae between 48 and 120 hpf treatments with ZO essential oil (0–3.91 µg/mL) was determined in this experiment. At 72 hpf, the heartbeat count was conducted using a stereomicroscope connected to a computer and digital camera device for video recording. Counting was performed using a mechanical counter and stopwatch. The heart rate was expressed as beats per minute (bpm) [ 23, 24].
